name: The Deep Unknown
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 48

On your Jorney you have to go deep into space. On your way to the next Wormhole, which brings you even deeper into space, you have to dodge asteroids and try to stay on track.

With that said - we hope you like our game and would like to know your best times on the different Lvl (via comment)

3D-Models by @danner007

Programming by @sirrafufl

Game- & Leveldesign by @danner007 & @sirrafufl

Changelog(1):

-More responsive player-controlls.
- Extra increased rotationspeed with "space"-button/controller:"X"
